name: Steve Hillage
description: '''Stephen Simpson Hillage''' (born 2 August 1951) is an English musician, best known as a guitarist. He is associated with the [[Canterbury scene]] and has worked in experimental domains since the late 1960s. Besides his solo recordings he has been a member of [[Uriel (band)|Uriel]], [[Khan (band)|Khan]], [[Gong (band)|Gong]] and [[System 7 (band)|System 7]].
